p: The COVID-19 pandemic has generated enhanced focus on the safety of healthcare providers and efforts to mitigate the risks of viral transmission. 1 Reports of previous viral epidemics have described substantially increased risk to providers performing laryngoscopy and tracheal intubation in patients infected with the virus. 2, 3 Additionally, bronchoscopy and other endoscopic airway procedures are considered high-risk, aerosol-generating procedures. 1
